long_description: Built with a beautiful wood veneer, the SKILOGIK Front Burner skis offer high-performance 84mm waists for resort-area skiing on surfaces ranging from hard to soft and turning styles from slalom to GS. Excellent carving performance makes them ideal for groomed runs and handling is quick for moguls and steeps. The Front Burner skis feature SKILOGIK Race Room construction which provides rock solid stability on hard surfaces and extra deep edge bite. Construction consists of a hardwood core layered in a composite of carbon and fiberglass, topped with an eye-pleasing wood veneer that speaks to beautiful craftsmanship. Complementary wood cores ensure that your left ski and right ski have a matched flex pattern. Black locust hardwood sidewalls offer extra grip. Base or topsheet color may vary from online photo.
short_description: Built with a beautiful wood veneer, the SKILOGIK Front Burner skis offer high-performance 84mm waists for resort-area skiing on surfaces ranging from hard to soft and turning styles from slalom to GS.
